input.sentences: driving down the wrong side of the road on our summer vacation .
some termite mounds along the way to our camp .
this giant lizard was sunning itself right next to the highway .
we stopped to get a closer look at this interesting reptile .
our camp site for the next few days on this leg of the trip .
output.sentences: This summer I felt like I was on the wrong vacation.
Instead of rolling mountains and sandy beaches all I got to see was come mounds of termites by my camp.
Instead of an African safari or a relaxing trip to the zoo I got to see a sunning lizard on the hightway.
As the reptile came closer I was hoping that this vacation would somehow be stopped.
Back at the camp site I realxed just happy that the trip was almost over and that I still had two legs after the close encounter with that modernday lizard.
